daily_activities: Morning: Visit Nelson's Dockyard, a historic dockyard and UNESCO World Heritage Site
Evening: Dine at a local restaurant, trying the famous Antiguan cuisine
Morning: Explore the English Harbour, with its picturesque views and historic buildings
Evening: Enjoy a romantic dinner at a beachfront restaurant
Morning: Take a sightseeing tour of the island, visiting famous spots like Shirley Heights and Valley Church Beach
Evening: Experience the local nightlife, with live music and cocktails at a popular bar
Morning: Visit the famous Stingray City, where you can swim with stingrays in their natural habitat
Evening: Savor a delicious seafood dinner at a waterfront restaurant
Morning: Go on a guided hike to the top of Mount Obama, with breathtaking views of the island
Evening: Farewell dinner at a fine dining restaurant, with a focus on local ingredients and cuisine

travel_instructions.route_details: From Ahmedabad, take a flight to a major international airport like Mumbai (BOM) or Delhi (DEL), then connect to a flight to a US or European airport with flights to the Caribbean, such as Miami (MIA) or London (LHR), and finally take a flight to V.C. Bird International Airport (ANU) in Antigua.
